Content: Hello, this is Valerie Leblanc from CustomerCare Co.. How can I assist you today? Hi Tammy Booth, I'm having an issue with my Bank Account. It's not functioning as expected. I'm sorry to hear that, Tammy Booth. Could you please provide me with your account number? Sure, it's 56288740. I recently noticed that my Bank Account is acting up. Thank you. Let me check your account details. It appears there's an update available for your Bank Account. Oh, I wasn't aware of that. How do I proceed with the update? I can guide you through the update process step by step. First, please open the UtilityApp on your device. Alright, I've opened it. What's next? Great. Now, navigate to the 'Settings' menu and select 'Update Software'. Done. It seems to be updating now. Perfect! Once the update is complete, your Bank Account should function correctly. I've reinstalled it, and it's working perfectly now. Thank you! I'm glad to hear that. Is there anything else I can assist you with today? No, that's all. Thanks again! You're welcome! Have a great day.
